subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: There is no questioning that at 31, Bode Miller, the defending World Cup overall champion from Franconia, N.H., can still do things on skis that no one else can.
snippet: There is no questioning that at 31, Bode Miller, the defending World Cup overall champion from Franconia, N.H., can still do things on skis that no one else can.
